description: Attempts to cancel an environment deployment on an  UpdateEnvironment action, if the deployment is IN_PROGRESS. For more information, see Update an environment in the Proton User guide. The following list includes potential cancellation scenarios.

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.description: The name of the environment with the deployment to cancel.

nested_items.name: environment
nested_items.description: The environment summary data that's returned by Proton.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the environment.

nested_items.name: codebuildRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM service role that allows Proton to provision infrastructure using CodeBuild-based provisioning on your behalf.

nested_items.name: componentRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM service role that Proton uses when provisioning directly defined components in this environment. It determines the scope of infrastructure that a component can provision.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the environment was created.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatus
nested_items.description: The environment deployment status.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatusMessage
nested_items.description: An environment deployment status message.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the environment.

nested_items.name: environmentAccountConnectionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment account connection that's used to provision infrastructure resources in an environment account.

nested_items.name: environmentAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment account that the environment infrastructure resources are provisioned in.

nested_items.name: lastAttemptedDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last attempted deployment of this environment.

nested_items.name: lastDeploymentAttemptedAt
nested_items.description: The time when a deployment of the environment was last attempted.

nested_items.name: lastDeploymentSucceededAt
nested_items.description: The time when the environment was last deployed successfully.

nested_items.name: lastSucceededDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last successful deployment of this environment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the environment.

nested_items.name: protonServiceRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Proton service role that allows Proton to make calls to other services on your behalf.

nested_items.name: provisioning
nested_items.description: When included, indicates that the environment template is for customer provisioned and managed infrastructure.

nested_items.name: provisioningRepository
nested_items.description: The linked repository that you use to host your rendered infrastructure templates for self-managed provisioning. A linked repository is a repository that has been registered with Proton. For more information, see CreateRepository.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the linked repository.

nested_items.name: branch
nested_items.description: The repository branch.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The repository name.

nested_items.name: provider
nested_items.description: The repository provider.

nested_items.name: spec
nested_items.description: The environment spec.

nested_items.name: templateMajorVersion
nested_items.description: The major version of the environment template.

nested_items.name: templateMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of the environment template.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the environment template.
